data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reynoso-Velasco, Daniel, Sites, Robert W. (2018): Revision of the Ambrysus pulchellus Montandon species complex (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Naucoridae). Zootaxa 4442 (3): 351-377, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.3.1|56 occurrences
